arguments.socionics: EIE: Dramatic, intense, and masterful at emotional manipulation. Hannibal's charismatic persona and ability to read/control others' emotions perfectly fit the Ethical-Intuitive Extrovert.
arguments.enneagram: so2: 'Social Conqueror' subtype, using charm and intellect to draw people in while maintaining hidden motives. His nurturing facade (as a psychiatrist) masks predatory instincts.
arguments.psychosophy: VELF (1V, 2E, 3L, 4F): Rationalizes his actions through a self-created moral code. His aestheticism and sensory indifference manifest in gourmet cannibalism, while his manupulativeness and social image justify his philosophy.

arguments.socionics: IEI: Introspective, identity-shifting, and prone to existential crises. Kaneki's internal monologues and evolving self-concept mirror the Intuitive-Ethical Introvert.
arguments.enneagram: so4: 'Outsider' subtype, oscillating between self-loathing and grandiosity. His struggle to belong (e.g., human/ghoul duality) reflects social instinct with a 4's intensity.
arguments.psychosophy: ELVF (1E, 2L, 3V, 4L): Emotionally turbulent, intellectualizes suffering and his own philosophy, usually both physically and emotionally fragile, effortlessly adapts to physical environment for survival with no disgust.

arguments.socionics: LIE: Strategic ambition masked by calculated charm. Akechi's relentless pursuit of recognition and mastery of systemic manipulation ('playing the game') reflect the Logical-Intuitive Extrovert's Te/Ni efficiency.
arguments.enneagram: so3: 'Deceptive Achiever' subtype, crafting a heroic public persona to conceal vengeful motives. His obsession with surpassing rivals (e.g., Joker) mirrors so3's addiction to external validation.
arguments.psychosophy: FLVE (1F, 2L, 3V, 4E): Obsessive control over outcomes, coldly pragmatic logic, vanity in his detective image, and emotionally compartmentalized rage fuel his martyr-complex theatrics.

arguments.socionics: LII: Hyper-logical, theoretical, and socially awkward. Sheldon's rigid adherence to systems (e.g., seat spot, roommate agreement) exemplifies the Logical-Intuitive Introvert.
arguments.enneagram: so6: 'Loyal Skeptic' subtype, seeking security through routines and intellectual superiority. His anxiety about change and need for 'safe' people (e.g., Leonard) reflect counterphobic 6.
arguments.psychosophy: LVFE (1L, 2V, 3F, 4E): Truth-seeking, conformist, physically disgusted, and emotionally childlike.

arguments.socionics: LSI: Stoic, territorial, and ruthlessly pragmatic. Walt's transformation from meek teacher to drug kingpin mirrors the Logical-Sensory Introvert's latent intensity.
arguments.enneagram: sx6: 'Lone Wolf' subtype, reacting to fear with aggression. His 'I am the danger' persona and loyalty tests (e.g., 'Say my name') show sexual 6's defensive dominance.
arguments.psychosophy: LFVE (1L, 2F, 3V, 4E): Control-obsessed, physically resourceful, self-esteem troubles & reputation anxiety, emotionally inert.

arguments.socionics: ESI: Passionate, morally absolutist, and possessive. Anakin's black-and-white loyalty ('If you're not with me, you're my enemy') fits the Ethical-Sensory Introvert.
arguments.enneagram: sx4: 'Hateful Romantic' subtype, oscillating between devotion and rage. His obsession with Padm√© and fear of abandonment drive his downfall, classic for sexual 4.
arguments.psychosophy: EFVL (1E, 2F, 3V, 4L): Emotionally volatile, physically skilled, self-justifying, and rigid in beliefs.

arguments.socionics: SLE: Assertive, strategic, focused on power and dominance. His transactional worldview and instinct for competition are hallmarks of the Sensory-Logical Extrovert.
arguments.enneagram: sp8: 'Survivalist' subtype, embodying drive for control manifests in his business and political tactics. The 'Might Makes Right' philosophy and constant boundary-testing are textbook sp8.
arguments.psychosophy: VFLE (1V, 2F, 3L, 4E): Outgoing dominant charisma, pragmatic focus on material results, competitive and questionable logic, emotional recklessness create his signature combative yet engaging style.

arguments.socionics: ILE: Rapid conceptual thinking, improvisational problem-solving, and Ne-driven scheming. Thrives on intellectual loopholes and adaptive 'clever guy' personas.
arguments.enneagram: sp7: 'Chaotic Charlatan' subtype anxiety channeled into hustles and silver-tongued reframing. Uses charm/denial to bypass consequences, framing survival as 'winning' through mental gymnastics.
arguments.psychosophy: FLVE (1F, 2L, 3V, 4E): Survival-first pragmatism, self-justifying logics, fluid self-presentation and chaotic emotional outbursts fuel his chameleonic grifts.

arguments.socionics: LIE: Strategic commander who reinvents military paradigms. His constant innovation in warfare tactics reflects Te/Ni goal-orientation of Logical-Intuitive Extravert.
arguments.enneagram: so7: 'Visionary Mastermind' subtype, justifying morally gray ops through grand ideological narratives. Uses revolutionary rhetoric to escape accountability.
arguments.psychosophy: VLFE (1V, 2L, 3F, 4E: Self-righteous visionary, pragmatic and debating, physically indulgent, emotionally detached from casualties.

arguments.socionics: ILI: Detached strategic observer predicting Angel attack patterns. Her Ni/Te analysis of combat scenarios fits Intuitive-Logical Introvert's forecasting.
arguments.enneagram: sp5: 'Withdrawn Observer' avoids emotional entanglement while cataloging human behavior. Treats body as disposable vessel (3F insecurity).
arguments.psychosophy: LFEV (1L, 2F, 3E, 4V): Analytical observer, physically indifferent, emotionally blank, will-less instrument.

arguments.socionics: ESE: Her Fe/Si warmth creates makeshift family unit for pilots. Bubbly social energy masks trauma through sensory indulgence (beer, casual dress).
arguments.enneagram: sx2: 'Flirtatious Caregiver' uses playful sexuality to bond with Kaji/Shinji. Clings to NERV team as substitute family after paternal loss.
arguments.psychosophy: FEVL (1F, 2E, 3V, 4L): Comfort-focused, emotionally demonstrative, reckless and self-critical, avoids complex strategies.

arguments.socionics: ILE: Master gambler exploiting Ne/Ti loopholes in games. His conceptual leaps and rule-bending epitomize Intuitive-Logical Extravert's intellectual play.
arguments.enneagram: sp7: 'Planning Charlatan' avoids emotional pain through high-stakes stimulation. Treats life as series of mental puzzles to conquer.
arguments.psychosophy: VLFE (1V, 2L, 3F, 4E): Willful strategist, logical trickster, physically resilient, emotionally detached.

arguments.socionics: LSE: Methodical and pragmatic problem-solver. Kim's structured approach to law and emphasis on measurable results ('doing the right way') aligns with Logical-Sensory Extravert's Te/Si prioritization.
arguments.enneagram: so1: 'Reformer' subtype, channeling perfectionism into social justice. Her repressed anger at systemic corruption reflects e1's moral rigidity fused with social instinct.
arguments.psychosophy: LVFE (1L, 2V, 3F, 4E): Truth-driven yet socially adaptable, physically disciplined and emotionally reserved.

arguments.socionics: EII: Introverted ethical sensitivity fused with abstract idealism. Shinji's paralyzing self-doubt and desperate need for approval ('I mustn't run away') reflect the Ethical-Intuitive Introvert's conflict between internal values and external demands.
arguments.enneagram: so4: 'Tormented Artist' subtype, amplifying alienation through social comparisons. His oscillation between clinging to Misato/Rei and rejecting connection mirrors 4's shame about inadequacy within group dynamics.
arguments.psychosophy: ELVF (1E, 2L, 3V, 4F): Emotionally overwhelmed, intellectualizes suffering through existential musings. Struggles to assert willpower, treats body as passive instrument, yet retains rigid moral idealism despite trauma.

arguments.socionics: SLI: Practical survivalist focused on tangible skills. Arthur's wilderness expertise and 'get the job done' mentality exemplify Si/Te pragmatism and passivity.
arguments.enneagram: sp9: 'Appetite' subtype, avoiding conflict through routine. His loyalty to the gang despite moral doubts reflects 9's dissociation from personal needs.
arguments.psychosophy: FLEV (1F, 2L, 3E, 4V): Survival-focused, analytical but self-doubting, emotionally repressed and adaptable to others' leadership.

arguments.socionics: IEE: Idealistic connector of people/ideas. Luke's faith in redemption ('there's still good in him') and Ne-driven optimism mirror Ethical-Intuitive Extravert traits.
arguments.enneagram: sx7: 'Enthusiast' subtype, chasing adventure to avoid pain. His shift from farmboy to Jedi reflects 7's escapism through grand narratives.
arguments.psychosophy: ELFV (1E, 2L, 3F, 4V): Emotionally expressive, intellectually curious, physically restless and unbothered by ethics.

arguments.socionics: ILI: Strategic analyst prioritizing Ni/Te. Rohan's detached observation of humanity and narrative manipulation exemplify Ni-base's future forecasting.
arguments.enneagram: so5: 'Ivory Tower' subtype. His artistic elitism and emotional detachment reflect 5's fear of helplessness through specialization.
arguments.psychosophy: LFVE (1L, 2F, 3V, 4E): Knowledge-hoarding, physically skilled/flexible, socially/competently insecure and emotionally chameleon.

arguments.socionics: SEE: Tactical opportunist thriving on Se/Fi dynamism. Tuco's explosive negotiations and resource control ('tight tight tight!') showcase Sensory-Ethical Extravert's adaptability.
arguments.enneagram: sx8: 'Challenger' subtype, enforcing loyalty through volatility. His 'family first' rhetoric masking paranoia aligns with sexual 8's possessive intensity.
arguments.psychosophy: VFEL (1V, 2F, 3E, 4L): Dominant willpower, physically indulgent, emotionally reckless, and dismissive of abstract logic.

arguments.socionics: ESI: Ethically rigid protector driven by personal loyalty. Ichigo's relentless defense of loved ones and black-and-white moral code ('I fight to protect') align with the Ethical-Sensory Introvert's Fi/Se resolve.
arguments.enneagram: sp4: 'Enduring Individualist' subtype, transmuting shame into hyper-competence. His secret fear of inadequacy (e.g., hybrid identity crises) manifests as overcompensation through battle prowess and emotional isolation.
arguments.psychosophy: EFVL (1E, 2F, 3V, 4L): Emotionally intense convictions fuel his willpower, physically dominant in combat, strategically pragmatic under pressure, yet struggles with existential self-worth beyond his warrior role.

arguments.socionics: SEI: Harmonious mediator attuned to Si/Fe. Her animal caretaking and aversion to conflict reflect Sensory-Ethical Introvert's comfort-focused empathy.
arguments.enneagram: sx9: 'Symbiosis' subtype, diffusing identity into relationships. Her 'Stare' episodes paradoxically show 9's repressed assertiveness emerging under pressure.
arguments.psychosophy: FELV: Physically nurturing, emotionally gentle, intellectually self-effacing, and morally flexible.

systems.socionics: Describes how characters process information and interact with the world
systems.enneagram: Identifies core motivations and fears (instincts: sp=self-preservation, so=social, sx=sexual)
systems.psychosophy: Prioritization of mental aspects: V = Volition, E = Emotion, L = Logic, F = Physics
